text: Sudi Silalahi (July 13, 1949 - October 25, 2021) was an Indonesian politician and lieutenant general. He was the Secretary of State from October 22, 2009 to October 20, 2014. He was born in Pematangsiantar, Indonesia. Silalahi died on October 25, 2021 from an illness in Jakarta, Indonesia, aged 72.Mantan Mensesneg Sudi Silalahi Meninggal Dunia di RSPAD ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Indonesian generals
title: Sudi Silalahi
